title: Undesirable Marriage - Novel Updates
tags: Doctors   Female Protagonist   Long Separations   Marriage   Modern Day   Short Story
author: 季可蔷
description:
Could this man, Dai Xingren, understand one thing clearly? They were still husband and wife, separated, not divorced!

Five years ago, she never agreed to divorce him to the end. She just agreed to the temporary separation.

And what was the result? He ended up never returning, wandering around the world for five years.

Satisfying his doctor’s needs of saving the lives of those suffering and distressed, he left her alone at home.

She hasn't evened her score with him yet.

Now that the man has finally returned, he returns with another woman!

Damn it! What does he mean, they're just good friends? Does he think he's single?

What kind of good friendship does he have with a person of the opposite sex that has made him forget he still has a wife awaiting him at home?

Humph, She was the one who took the initiative to chase her husband by all means back then.

This wife's position was hard won by her after going through a lot. Now was the time. 

She must ask him to compensate her for the five years of marriage.

And as for being his wife, she's not tired of it yet.

Does he expect her to willingly give it up to another woman? Don't even think about it...>
